items.sentence: I considered teaching French, but decided it would be better not to.
We're having a meeting this afternoon? Do you think you can make it?
I wouldn't go out with you even if you were the last woman on earth.
How many times did you go to Australia when you were in high school?
I lived in Australia a few years ago, but now I live in New Zealand.
Tom and I've decided not to go to Australia for Christmas this year.
Judging from how the sky looks, we might have a downpour any moment.
Why is it that you can write French so well, but you can't speak it?
What was the last thing that you bought that you didn't really need?
As far as Tom is concerned, it's quantity, not quality, that counts.
